content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, although the fictional character described here doesn't exist in reality, let's pretend I'm Peter Schmidt focusing solely on the rental price negotiation for the apartment in Magdeburg.

To start with, I propose a rental price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a bit too high for me. I would be able to pay 900 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offered price significantly undervalues my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize for that. Let's negotiate a bit more. I could do 1000 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
While I see some improvement, I still think my apartment deserves more. However, considering your interest, I lower my expectations slightly and agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month!

TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
